async get_all() → List[T][source]¶

Fetch all records.

async patch(id: int, obj_in: Dict[str, Any]) → T | None[source]¶

Partial update of an existing record by updating only provided fields. obj_in: A dictionary containing the fields to be updated.

async update(id: int, obj_in: Dict[str, Any]) → T | None[source]¶

Full update of an existing record by replacing all fields. obj_in: A dictionary containing the updated data.
